verses.name: John 6:1
verses.text: After these things Jesus went over the sea of Galilee, which is the sea of Tiberias.

verses.name: John 6:2
verses.text: And a great multitude followed him, because they saw his miracles which he did on them that were diseased.

verses.name: John 6:3
verses.text: And Jesus went up into a mountain, and there he sat with his disciples.

verses.name: John 6:4
verses.text: And the passover, a feast of the Jews, was nigh.

verses.name: John 6:5
verses.text: When Jesus then lifted up his eyes, and saw a great company come unto him, he saith unto Philip, Whence shall we buy bread, that these may eat?
